thing-type.label: MH-S521 Shutter Panel
thing-type.description: Shutter Panel<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTouch Panel Switch is a wall panel built-in with Z-Wave Plus module. With its stylish design and stable performance, the panel can be used to control house-hold electrical appliances like lamp, motor, coffee machine, TV set etc.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gt The device can be manually woken with a button press on the device</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Power Failure State
parameter.description: switch will be off when powered again

options.option: not saved
saved

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameter.description: ALL ON/ALL OFF

options.option: forbid ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF
forbid ALL ON, allow ALL OFF
allow ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF
allow ALL ON, allow ALL OFF

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: LED Backlit brightness level
parameter.description: LED Backlit brightness level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0 - LED disabled</li&gt <li&gt1 - 10 Min level - max level</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Key Mode
parameter.description: Key Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis function works for corridor or stairwell situation. </p&gt</p&gt

options.option: single click to switch on/off status
Key default as off state
Key default as on state
hold >3s then key is on, and off once released
single click + hold >3s then key is on

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Key On duration
parameter.description: Key On duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0 - infinite</li&gt <li&gt1~65535 unit "sec"</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Basic CC integration setting
parameter.description: Basic CC integration setting<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt<strong&gtThis parameter works for integration with different gateways/systems. If you do not know how to use, keep as default. </strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt0x00 "Basic Set" received，key 1 responds; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; key 1 will <strong&gtnot</strong&gt send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association</li&gt <li&gt0x01 "Basic Set" received，key 1 responds; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; key 1 will send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association</li&gt <li&gt0x02 "Basic Set" received，all keys respond; "Basic Get" received，not reply "Basic Report"; All keys will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint） to LifeLine Association</li&gt <li&gt0x03 "Basic Set" received，all keys respond; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; All keys will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_16_1
parameter.label: 16: Scene respond
parameter.description: Scene respond<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</li&gt <li&gtBit0: =1 Key1 respond scene <ul&gt<li&gt=0 Key1 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit1: =1 Key2 respond scene <ul&gt<li&gt=0 Key2 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit2: =1 Key3 respond scene <ul&gt<li&gt=0 Key3 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit7:4 Rev </li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: Key1 Scene Activate Mode Setting
parameter.description: Key1 Scene Activate Mode Setting

options.option: Scene activate function disabled
One click key1 always activate scene ID1
only activate scene ID1 when key1's relay open
only activate scene ID1 when key1's relay closed

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: Key1 Activate Scene ID
parameter.description: Key1 Activate Scene ID<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00 Scene ID is invalid and will not send scene activate command.</li&gt <li&gt1~255 Scene ID</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_19_1
parameter.label: 19: Key1 Activate Scene Duration
parameter.description: Key1 Activate Scene Duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00 Instantly</li&gt <li&gt0x01~0x7F: Dimming durations from 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1-second resolution</li&gt <li&gt0x80~0xFE: Specify dimming durations from 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1-minute resolution. </li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_20_1
parameter.label: 20: Key2 Scene Activate Mode Setting
parameter.description: Key2 Scene Activate Mode Setting

options.option: Scene activate function disabled
always activate scene ID1
,only activate scene ID1 when key2's relay open
nly activate scene ID1 when key2's relay closed

parameter.name: config_21_1
parameter.label: 21: Key2 Activate Scene ID
parameter.description: Key2 Activate Scene ID<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00 Scene ID is invalid and will not send scene activate command.</li&gt <li&gt1~255 Scene ID</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_22_1
parameter.label: 22: Key2 Activate Scene Duration
parameter.description: Key2 Activate Scene Duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00 Instantly</li&gt <li&gt0x01~0x7F: Dimming durations from 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1-second resolution</li&gt <li&gt0x80~0xFE: Specify dimming durations from 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1-minute resolution</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_23_1
parameter.label: 23: Key3 Scene Activate Mode Setting
parameter.description: Key3 Scene Activate Mode Setting

options.option: Scene activate function disabled
always activate scene ID1
only activate scene ID1 when key3's relay open
only activate scene ID1 when key3's relay closed

parameter.name: config_24_1
parameter.label: 24: Key3 Activate Scene ID
parameter.description: Key3 Activate Scene ID<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00 Scene ID is invalid and will not send scene activate command.</li&gt <li&gt1~255 Scene ID</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_25_1
parameter.label: 25: Key3 Activate Scene Duration
parameter.description: Key3 Activate Scene Duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00 Instantly</li&gt <li&gt0x01~0x7F: Dimming durations from 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1-second resolution</li&gt <li&gt0x80~0xFE: Specify dimming durations from 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1-minute resolution. </li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_32_1
parameter.label: 32: Scene respond ID 1-50
parameter.description: Scene respond ID 1-50<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</li&gt <li&gtBit0: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key1 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key1 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit1: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key2 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key2 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit2: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key3 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key3 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit7:4 Rev</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtValid only when the default is 0X00 for parameter 0X10</strong&gt</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_33_1
parameter.label: 33: Scene respond ID 51-100
parameter.description: Scene respond ID 51-100<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</li&gt <li&gtBit0: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key1 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key1 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit1: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key2 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key2 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit2: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key3 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key3 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit7:4 Rev</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtValid only when the default is 0X00 for parameter 0X10</strong&gt</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_34_1
parameter.label: 34: Scene respond ID 101-150
parameter.description: Scene respond ID 101-150<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</li&gt <li&gtBit0: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key1 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key1 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit1: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key2 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key2 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit2: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key3 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key3 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit7:4 Rev</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtValid only when the default is 0X00 for parameter 0X10</strong&gt</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 35: Scene respond ID 151-200
parameter.description: Scene respond ID 151-200<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</li&gt <li&gtBit0: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key1 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key1 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit1: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key2 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key2 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit2: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key3 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key3 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit7:4 Rev</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtValid only when the default is 0X00 for parameter 0X10</strong&gt</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 36: Scene respond ID 201-250
parameter.description: Scene respond ID 201-250<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gt0x00: Scene respond disabled</li&gt <li&gtBit0: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key1 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key1 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit1: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key2 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key2 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit2: <ul&gt<li&gt=1 Key3 respond scene</li&gt <li&gt=0 Key3 not respond scene</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit7:4 Rev</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtValid only when the default is 0X00 for parameter 0X10</strong&gt</p&gt</p&gt
